body.p: On March 15th and 16th, there will be a FSFE booth during the Chemnitzer Linux-Tage, an event dedicated to everything about GNU/Linux and Free Software. Just pass by the booth to get to know people from the FSFE as well as other Fellows. The booth will also come with brand new merchandise and promotion material. Guido Arnold will do a talk about "Freie Software in der Bildung â€“ ein Blick auf Europa" (Free Software in Education - a View on Europe)
